TopicTitle: Remapped Keybinds sometimes don't work until I re-save them

Articles.Content:
For every game I own, I re-bind All The Keys, and it's very apparent in KSP2 when I launch that the keys sometimes don't work, period. (I use the numkey pad for flight and EVA).

To fix, I pause the game and go to Settings > Input and click Apply Settings, and the keys work again.

Anyone know if there's something else going on here that I'm not aware of (other than a bug)?
